items.name: Crispy Fried Chicken
items.description: Our signature golden-fried chicken, seasoned to perfection with our secret blend of spices.

items.name: Chicken Wings (10pc)
items.description: Crispy fried wings tossed in your choice of sauce: Buffalo, BBQ, Honey Garlic, or Lemon Pepper.

items.name: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Hand-breaded chicken tenders served with your choice of dipping sauce.

items.name: Whiting Fish
items.description: Fresh whiting fillets, lightly seasoned and fried to golden perfection.

items.name: Catfish Fillet
items.description: Southern-style catfish fillet with cornmeal breading.

items.name: Tilapia
items.description: Mild and flaky tilapia fillet, perfectly seasoned and fried.

items.name: Jumbo Shrimp (6pc)
items.description: Large butterflied shrimp, golden fried and served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Seafood Platter
items.description: A feast of fried shrimp, fish fillet, crab cake, and calamari rings.

items.name: Fish & Chicken Combo
items.description: 2 pieces of whiting fish and 2 pieces of fried chicken with fries and coleslaw.

items.name: Family Bucket
items.description: 8 pieces of chicken, 4 fish fillets, large fries, coleslaw, and 4 drinks.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy golden fries, seasoned to perfection.

items.name: Coleslaw
items.description: Creamy, fresh-made coleslaw with a hint of sweetness.

items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy, cheesy macaroni made fresh daily.

items.name: Fountain Drinks
